description.zh-cn: 1926年至1928年间，中国国民党领导的国民革命军向北洋军阀发动的内战，最终完成了形式上的中国统一。
description.en: A military campaign launched by the National Revolutionary Army of the Kuomintang against the Beiyang government and its regional warlords from 1926 to 1928, resulting in the nominal unification of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国在1925年至1948年间的治权机构，由中国国民党建立。
description.en: The governing authority of the Republic of China from 1925 to 1948, established by the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的创建政党，由孙中山于1919年改组成立。
description.en: The founding political party of the Republic of China, reorganized by Sun Yat-sen in 1919.

description.zh-cn: 1925年至1947年间中华民国的国家军队，由中国国民党于广州建立。
description.en: The military arm of the Kuomintang from 1925 to 1947.

description.zh-cn: 民国初年控制北洋政府及华北地区的各个军事政治集团的总称。
description.en: A collective term for the various military-political factions that controlled the Beiyang government and northern China in the early Republican era.

description.zh-cn: 指中华民国前期以北洋军人为主导的中央政府，以北京为首都。
description.en: Refers to the central government of the Republic of China in its early period, dominated by Beiyang Army figures and based in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代史上的重要政治及军事人物，曾任国民政府主席、中华民国总统等职。
description.en: A prominent political and military figure in modern Chinese history, who served as Chairman of the Nationalist Government and President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党与中国共产党在1924年至1927年间的合作时期。
description.en: The period of cooperation between the Kuomintang (KMT) and the Chinese Communist Party (CCP) from 1924 to 1927.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党，成立于1921年。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China, founded in 1921.

description.zh-cn: 一个存在于1922年至1991年的欧亚大陆社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state in Eurasia that existed from 1922 to 1991.

description.zh-cn: 民国时期军事家、政治家，西北军领袖。
description.en: A warlord and politician during the Republican era, leader of the Northwestern Army.

description.zh-cn: 民国时期军事家、政治家，长期统治山西省。
description.en: A warlord and politician during the Republican era who controlled Shanxi province for a long time.

description.zh-cn: 民国时期奉系军阀首领，北洋政府末代国家元首。
description.en: The leader of the Fengtian clique of warlords and the last head of state of the Beiyang government.

description.zh-cn: 1928年6月4日，奉系军阀首领张作霖乘坐的专列在沈阳皇姑屯被日本关东军预埋的炸药炸毁，张作霖重伤不治身亡的事件。
description.en: An event on June 4, 1928, in which the train carrying Fengtian clique leader Zhang Zuolin was destroyed by a bomb planted by the Japanese Kwantung Army at Huanggutun, Shenyang, leading to his death.

description.zh-cn: 张作霖长子，奉系军阀领袖，后归顺国民政府。
description.en: The eldest son of Zhang Zuolin, leader of the Fengtian clique, who later pledged allegiance to the Nationalist Government.

description.zh-cn: 1928年12月29日，奉系领袖张学良宣布遵守三民主义，服从国民政府，将东北所悬挂的北洋政府五色旗更换为国民政府的青天白日满地红旗的事件。
description.en: An event on December 29, 1928, where Fengtian leader Zhang Xueliang announced his allegiance to the Nationalist Government, replacing the Beiyang government's five-colored flag with the KMT's flag in Northeast China.

description.zh-cn: 1927年，国民政府内部因对共产党态度不同而分裂为南京和武汉两个政府的事件。
description.en: An event in 1927 where the Nationalist Government split into two rival governments in Nanjing and Wuhan due to differing attitudes towards the Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 民国时期直系军阀首领。
description.en: A leader of the Zhili clique of warlords during the Republican era.

description.zh-cn: 民国时期直系军阀，后期“五省联军”总司令。
description.en: A warlord of the Zhili clique during the Republican era, later commander of the 'Five-Province Allied Army'.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事家，中国人民解放军创始人之一，曾任国民革命军第四军独立团团长。
description.en: A Chinese military leader, one of the founders of the People's Liberation Army, and former commander of the Independent Regiment of the National Revolutionary Army's Fourth Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，湖南军阀，后归附国民政府。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China and a warlord in Hunan, who later joined the Nationalist Government.

description.zh-cn: 1927年宁汉分裂时期，由国民党左派及共产党控制的国民政府。
description.en: The Nationalist Government controlled by the KMT left-wing and the CCP during the Nanjing-Wuhan split in 1927.

description.zh-cn: 1927年宁汉分裂时期，由蒋中正等人成立的国民政府，与武汉国民政府对立。
description.en: The Nationalist Government established by Chiang Kai-shek and others during the Nanjing-Wuhan split in 1927, in opposition to the Wuhan government.

description.zh-cn: 1927年4月12日，由中国国民党在上海发动的针对共产党员的清洗行动，导致第一次国共合作破裂。
description.en: A purge of Communists in Shanghai initiated by the Kuomintang on April 12, 1927, which led to the collapse of the First United Front.

description.zh-cn: 1928年北伐期间，国民革命军在济南与日本军队发生的武装冲突，导致中方人员重大伤亡。
description.en: An armed conflict between the National Revolutionary Army and Japanese troops in Jinan during the Northern Expedition in 1928, resulting in significant Chinese casualties.

description.zh-cn: 指1868年至1947年间的日本，当时其政治体制为君主立宪制。
description.en: Refers to Japan from 1868 to 1947, when its political system was a constitutional monarchy.

description.zh-cn: 1927年8月，国民革命军在南京龙潭地区击败孙传芳军队的一次关键性战役。
description.en: A decisive battle in August 1927 where the National Revolutionary Army defeated Sun Chuanfang's forces in the Longtan area of Nanjing.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军一级上将，黄埔军校总教官，曾任国民革命军第一军军长。
description.en: A general of the Republic of China Army, chief instructor at the Whampoa Military Academy, and former commander of the NRA First Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事家、政治家，新桂系首领。
description.en: A military leader and politician of the Republic of China, and the leader of the New Guangxi clique.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军一级上将，新桂系核心人物。
description.en: A general of the Republic of China Army and a key figure in the New Guangxi clique.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代思想家、政治家、教育家、史学家、文学家。
description.en: A Chinese thinker, politician, educator, historian, and writer of the modern era.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代思想家、史学家、朴学大师、民族主义革命者。
description.en: A Chinese philologist, textual critic, philosopher, and revolutionary.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代民主革命家，中国国民党创党总理，中华民国国父。
description.en: A Chinese statesman, physician, and political philosopher, who served as the provisional first president of the Republic of China and the first leader of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党领导国民革命军发动了北伐战争。
description.en: The Kuomintang led the National Revolutionary Army to launch the Northern Expedition.

description.zh-cn: 北伐战争最终瓦解了北洋军阀及其掌控的北洋政府。
description.en: The Northern Expedition ultimately dismantled the Beiyang warlords and the Beiyang government under their control.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军北伐的主要目标是消灭北洋军阀。
description.en: The main objective of the National Revolutionary Army's Northern Expedition was to eliminate the Beiyang warlords.

description.zh-cn: 被国民政府任命为国民革命军总司令，领导北伐。
description.en: Appointed by the Nationalist Government as Commander-in-Chief of the National Revolutionary Army to lead the Northern Expedition.

description.zh-cn: 在第一次国共合作期间，两党合作进行国民革命，包括北伐战争初期。
description.en: During the First United Front, the two parties cooperated in the National Revolution, including the initial phase of the Northern Expedition.

description.zh-cn: 苏联向国民政府提供军事顾问、武器弹药等援助，支持其建立军队和进行北伐。
description.en: The Soviet Union provided military advisors, weapons, and ammunition to the Nationalist Government, supporting the establishment of its army and the Northern Expedition.

description.zh-cn: 张作霖在皇姑屯事件中被日本关东军预埋的炸药炸死。
description.en: Zhang Zuolin was killed in the Huanggutun incident by a bomb planted by the Japanese Kwantung Army.

description.zh-cn: 在其父张作霖死后，宣布东北归顺国民政府。
description.en: After the death of his father Zhang Zuolin, he announced the allegiance of Northeast China to the Nationalist Government.

description.zh-cn: 东北易帜标志着国民政府在形式上完成了中国统一，象征着北伐的结束。
description.en: The Northeast Flag Replacement marked the nominal unification of China by the Nationalist Government, symbolizing the end of the Northern Expedition.

description.zh-cn: 国民政府内部分裂为南京和武汉两个政府，导致北伐一度停顿。
description.en: The split of the Nationalist Government into two rival governments in Nanjing and Wuhan caused the Northern Expedition to halt temporarily.

description.zh-cn: 北伐军在湖南、湖北战场上，通过汀泗桥、贺胜桥等战役，基本消灭了吴佩孚的军事主力。
description.en: On the Hunan and Hubei battlefields, the Northern Expeditionary Army essentially eliminated the main military forces of Wu Peifu through battles like Tingsiqiao and Heshengqiao.

description.zh-cn: 北伐军在江西、福建、浙江、江苏等战场上与孙传芳军队作战，并最终将其击败。
description.en: The Northern Expeditionary Army fought and ultimately defeated Sun Chuanfang's forces on the battlefields of Jiangxi, Fujian, Zhejiang, and Jiangsu.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正在上海发动清党，清洗国民党内的共产党员及左派。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek initiated the party purge in Shanghai to eliminate communists and leftists within the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 清党事件标志着第一次国共合作的彻底破裂。
description.en: The party purge marked the complete breakdown of the First United Front.

description.zh-cn: 清党后，蒋中正在南京另立国民政府，与武汉的国民政府对立，形成宁汉分裂局面。
description.en: After the purge, Chiang Kai-shek established a separate Nationalist Government in Nanjing, opposing the government in Wuhan and leading to the Nanjing-Wuhan split.

description.zh-cn: 在宁汉分裂期间，武汉国民政府开除蒋中正党籍并下令讨伐。
description.en: During the Nanjing-Wuhan split, the Wuhan Nationalist Government expelled Chiang Kai-shek from the party and ordered a punitive expedition against him.

description.zh-cn: 日本出兵山东制造济南惨案，对北伐的顺利进行造成了阻碍。
description.en: Japan's dispatch of troops to Shandong, which caused the Jinan Incident, obstructed the smooth progress of the Northern Expedition.

description.zh-cn: 日本军队于1928年4月出兵山东，最终在5月3日与北伐军发生冲突，制造了济南惨案。
description.en: Japanese troops were dispatched to Shandong in April 1928, eventually clashing with the Northern Expeditionary Army on May 3, creating the Jinan Incident.

description.zh-cn: 在龙潭战斗中，孙传芳的部队被国民革命军决定性地击败，使其丧失了反攻南京的能力。
description.en: In the Battle of Longtan, Sun Chuanfang's forces were decisively defeated by the National Revolutionary Army, eliminating his ability to counter-attack Nanjing.

description.zh-cn: 冯玉祥的西北军在北伐期间加入国民革命军序列，成为第二集团军。
description.en: Feng Yuxiang's Northwestern Army joined the National Revolutionary Army during the Northern Expedition, becoming the Second Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 阎锡山的晋军在北伐期间加入国民革命军序列，成为第三集团军。
description.en: Yan Xishan's Shanxi army joined the National Revolutionary Army during the Northern Expedition, becoming the Third Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 梁启超认为北伐“毫无道德”，对其持负面评价。
description.en: Liang Qichao held a negative view of the Northern Expedition, describing it as having 'no morality'.

description.zh-cn: 章太炎将北伐视为“叛国行为”。
description.en: Zhang Taiyan regarded the Northern Expedition as an 'act of treason'.

description.zh-cn: 孙中山一贯主张发动北伐战争以统一中国，其思想是北伐战争的理论基础和动员力量。
description.en: Sun Yat-sen consistently advocated for launching a Northern Expedition to unify China; his ideas formed the theoretical basis and mobilizing force for the campaign.
